text:
terentev@abak-comp:~()$ ssh -t proxy@knife.railsc.ru -p 2022 db.ttt
Trying to connect to db.ttt
Opening shell
root@95549bf9bc08:/# psql -U pc -d docker
psql (9.6.6)
Type "help" for help.

docker=> \d+ product_groups;
                                                                     Table "public.product_groups"
        Column        |            Type             |                          Modifiers                          | Storage  | Stats target |        Description        
----------------------+-----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+----------+--------------+---------------------------
 id                   | integer                     | not null default nextval('product_groups_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    |              | 
 company_id           | integer                     |                                                             | plain    |              | 
 name                 | character varying(255)      |                                                             | extended |              | 
 description          | text                        |                                                             | extended |              | 
 position             | integer                     |                                                             | plain    |              | 
 created_at           | timestamp without time zone |                                                             | plain    |              | 
 updated_at           | timestamp without time zone |                                                             | plain    |              | 
 page_title           | character varying(255)      |                                                             | extended |              | 
 url_name             | character varying(255)      |                                                             | extended |              | 
 parent_id            | integer                     |                                                             | plain    |              | 
 depth                | integer                     | not null default 0                                          | plain    |              | 
 yml_id               | character varying(32)       |                                                             | extended |              | ID   YML-
 children_count       | integer                     | not null default 0                                          | plain    |              | 
 page_header          | character varying(75)       |                                                             | extended |              | 
 page_description     | character varying(255)      |                                                             | extended |              | 
 detailed_description | text                        |                                                             | extended |              | 
Indexes:
    "product_groups_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
    "index_product_groups_on_company_id_and_yml_id" UNIQUE, btree (company_id, yml_id)
    "uniq_product_groups_company_id_parent_id_position" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (company_id, parent_id, "position") DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
    "i_product_groups_company_id" btree (company_id)
    "index_product_groups_on_parent_id_and_position" btree (parent_id, "position")
    "uniq_product_groups_company_id_position_where_parent_id_is_null" EXCLUDE USING btree (company_id WITH =, (COALESCE(parent_id, 0)) WITH =, "position" WITH =) WHERE (parent_id IS NULL) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
Check constraints:
    "product_groups_company_id_not_null" CHECK (company_id IS NOT NULL)
    "valid_parent_id" CHECK (COALESCE(parent_id, 0) <> id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_product_groups_company_id" FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES companies(id) ON DELETE CASCADE DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
    "fk_product_groups_parent_id_to_product_groups_id" FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES product_groups(id) ON DELETE SET NULL DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
Referenced by:
    TABLE "company_user_bindings" CONSTRAINT "company_user_bindings_product_group_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY (product_group_id) REFERENCES product_groups(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
    TABLE "company_storefront_product_groups" CONSTRAINT "fk_company_storefront_product_groups_product_group_id" FOREIGN KEY (product_group_id) REFERENCES product_groups(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
    TABLE "product_groups" CONSTRAINT "fk_product_groups_parent_id_to_product_groups_id" FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES product_groups(id) ON DELETE SET NULL DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
    TABLE "products" CONSTRAINT "fk_products_product_group_id" FOREIGN KEY (product_group_id) REFERENCES product_groups(id) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
    TABLE "product_group_images" CONSTRAINT "product_group_images_product_group_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY (product_group_id) REFERENCES product_groups(id) ON DELETE CASCADE DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED
Triggers:
    tr_denorm_product_denormalization_groups AFTER UPDATE OF parent_id, "position" ON product_groups FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE pgq.logutriga('q_product_denormalization_groups', 'backup', 'ignore=company_id,name,description,created_at,updated_at,page_title,url_name,depth,yml_id,children_count')
